resources.string: Javatpoint is passionate to offer better technical content to the world.
Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google.

Hi I’m Nick. I’ve been developing apps for iPhones and iPads since Apple first created the App Store and opened the iOS platform to 3rd party developers in 2008.I’m a Entrepreneurial App Developer & Consultant. My client work is exciting and diverse. As well as being a very experienced coder I’ve also attained a wealthof knowledge of consumer and enterprise app distribution and am regularly commissioned to consult and help clients make the most of the incredible Apple technologies that have becomesuch a core part of our culture over the last 8 years.
